title: Our Open Marriage Experiment Did Not Go Well
description:
This episode is a doozy. First, we talk with a wife hoping to rebuild her relationship after she and her husband tried an open marriage, a woman desperate to help her adult daughter who’s addicted to exercise, and a widow trying to blend families after losing two husbands. And if you like creepy, stick around for the end—Delony breaks down the children’s book that left its unique mark on us all, Love You Forever.
  Lyrics of the Day: "Ophelia" - The Lumineers
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
  Support Our Sponsors:
  BetterHelp

  Resources:
  Own Your Past, Change Your Future

If you are having a health or mental health emergency, please call 9-1-1 immediately.
